summary: Armed with a knife and a fork, you are... THE FORKSASSIN!
descriptionHtml:
[b]Armed with a knife and a fork, you are... [i]THE FORKSASSIN![/i][/b]
------------------------
*I highly recommend getting [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4603]Dining Knife and Fork Retexture[/url] when using this mod.
*For extra fun, consider using this mod with [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=774]Killable Children[/url].

[b]Overview[/b]
------------------------
In a nutshell, this mod lets you craft, enchant, and improve forks and knives. They will be considered daggers made of iron, and will behave accordingly. If you have a 15x multiplier while sneaking with daggers, you will have a 15x multiplier while sneaking with forks and knives.

Three versions of the mod exists

Realistic - Base damage of forks is 1, base damage of knives is 2.
Balanced - Base damage of forks and knives is 4. (As iron daggers)
Godlike - Base damage of forks and knives is 15. (More powerful than daedric daggers)

All three are bundled together, each with their own .esp. Pick whichever you prefer, but only ONE of them. For comparison, an Iron Dagger has a base damage of 4, and a Daedric Dagger a base damage of 11.

Make sure you load this mod after any mod that modifies Forks and Knives. If you want to be sure, load last.

[b]Upcoming Changes[/b]
-------------------
Following the release of the Creation Kit, I will try to 
* Add spoons
* Add Dwemer cutlery for weapons
* Add Ysgramor\'s Soup Spoon as a weapon

No promises, but let\'s all cross our fingers.

[b]Version History[/b]
-------------------
1.0 -- Original Release.
1.1 -- Fixed 3rd person mode issues, and sound issues.
1.2 -- Cleaner installation with the Nexus Mod Manager. Otherwise the same as 1.1.
author: Headbomb
